--0-312173172-1302526788=:51828
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

hello
I am using Heritrix 1.14.4 and i want to crawl about 200 million web pages(only 
text/html).
But there is a problem, at the begining  of the crawling process the download 
rate is high(My Bandwidth is 10 Mb /sec) and i can download 20 - 30 webpages per 
second but as times goes up the downrate reduced. My crawler system has 16Gbye 
RAM and i reserved 10Gb For heap space. i assigned 70 threads to heritrix. but 
interesting point is that when 5Gbyte of heap space is Used the download rate is 
low(13 URL per second) and only 23 million webpages is queued and 8 million web 
pages is downloaded but my doanload rate is low. where is the problem!!!, did i 
need a system with higher resources. what resources are desire to crawl 200,000 
web pages? (after i analysis the out put i found that we crawled 900,000 
different domain).

--0-312173172-1302526788=:51828
Content-Type: text/html; charset=us-ascii

<html><head><style type="text/css"><!-- DIV {margin:0px;} --></style></head><body><div style="font-family:times new roman,new york,times,serif;font-size:12pt"><div>hello<br>I am using Heritrix 1.14.4 and i want to crawl about 200 million web pages(only text/html).<br>But there is a problem, at the begining  of the crawling process the download rate is high(My Bandwidth is 10 Mb /sec) and i can download 20 - 30 webpages per second but as times goes up the downrate reduced. My crawler system has 16Gbye RAM and i reserved 10Gb For heap space. i assigned 70 threads to heritrix. but interesting point is that when 5Gbyte of heap space is Used the download rate is low(13 URL per second) and only 23 million webpages is queued and 8 million web pages is downloaded but my doanload rate is low. where is the problem!!!, did i need a system with higher resources. what resources are desire to crawl 200,000 web pages? (after i analysis the out put i found
 that we crawled 900,000 different domain).<br></div>
</div></body></html>
--0-312173172-1302526788=:51828--
